Task ID:
\h(《Owner of the Inn》)It will cost you 10 gold to stay for the night.
Would you like to stay?\e

\h(《What will you do?》)”We'll come back later!”
”Let's stay the night here!”\e

\h(《Aika》)We're not quite ready to sleep right now. 
We'll be come later!\e

\h(《Aika》)Sounds great!
Well, actually, could you do us a favor?\e

\h(《Aika》)We're planning on staying for a while, so would 
it be alright if we paid you when we check out?\e

\h(《Owner of the Inn》)No problem.
In that case, go ahead and use the room upstairs
and down the hall.\e

\h(《Aika》)Looks like we're going to be stuck in Nasrad for
a little while.\e
\h(《Fina》)What are we going to do tomorrow?\e

\h(《Aika》)Well, I was thinking about looking for a place 
to work. We have to save up some gold.\e

\h(《Aika》)Let's put aside the money that we got from 
Clara. If we save up some more, we can buy 
a small ship and go looking for Vyse.\e
\h(《Aika》)What do you think, Fina?\e

\h(《Fina》)Yes!
That sounds like a good plan.\e

\h(《Aika》)Well, tonight let's just get some rest and hope 
for the best!\e
\h(《Aika》)But I wonder where Vyse is, though…\e

\h(《Fina》)Vyse…
I wonder if you're looking at the same moon 
right now…\e

\h(《Owner of the Inn》)It's 10 gold for a night.
Would you like to stay?\e

\h(《What shall we do?》)”We'll be back later.”
”We'll stay here.”\e

\h(《Vyse》)Hmm… I think we're going to look around town a 
little bit more. We'll back a little later.\e

\h(《Vyse》)We'll stay here.
Oh, I have one more person with me, so we'll 
need a room for two.\e

\h(《Owner of the Inn》)That's quite alright.
You can use first room at the top of the stairs.\e

\h(《Vyse》)This looks like the room.
I guess I just have to wait for Gilder here.\e

\h(《Aika》)It's payday!!!
Working as a waitress was actually more fun 
than I thought!\e

\h(《Fina》)I… I've never worked for gold before. 
It's… it's rather exciting actually.\e

\h(《Aika》)With the rest of our pay, we'll finally have the
10,000 gold we need to buy a ship! 
Let's stop by the tavern and pick up our gold!\e

\h(《Aika》)Sir!
What's wrong?!
Do you need help?\e

\h(《Old Man》)Ugh…
Starving… Thirsty…
Need water… Need food…\e

\h(《Aika》)Alright, just hang on.
I'll bring you inside, we'll take care of you.\e

\h(《Old Man》)Thank you for your kindness.
My name is Pedro. 
I'm not sure how I can repay you.\e

\h(《Aika》)That's quite alright. Don't give it another 
thought. Helping people in distress is what we 
Blue Rogues live for.\e

\h(《Pedro》)Oh…!
You're an Air Pirate?\e

\h(《Pedro》)I can't do much to repay you, but please accept 
this…\e

\h(《Aika》)What's this?
It looks like an old map…\e

\h(《Pedro》)I, I used to be a sailor.
I used to travel with my friend, Gonzales…\e

\h(《Pedro》)One day, we were lucky enough to find this… 
”Daccat's Map.”\e
\h(《Fina》)Daccat's… Map?\e

\h(《Pedro》)About 5 generations ago, long before my time… 
There was a great Air Pirate named Daccat that 
terrorized the world.\e

\h(《Pedro》)And this map supposedly shows where Captain
Daccat hid all of his treasures… 
”Treasure Island.”\e
\h(《Aika》)But, half of the map is missing!\e

\h(《Pedro》)Well, Gonzales and I promised each other to look
for it together someday…\e

\h(《Pedro》)We tore the map in half and we each carried a 
piece with us.\e

\h(《Pedro》)Right after we found the map, we were attacked
by Black Pirates.\e

\h(《Pedro》)We had to abandon ship.
I don't know what happened to Gonzales, but I 
ended up here in Nasrad.\e

\h(《Pedro》)I've been waiting for him in this town for a 
very long time… I don't think I'll ever see him
again.\e
\h(《Fina》)That's very sad…\e

\h(《Pedro》)Now I am too old to be going off looking 
for buried treasure.\e

\h(《Pedro》)I'm sure that Gonzales would have been happy if
you found the treasure…\e

\h(《Pedro》)…Thank you for saving me.
Good luck finding that treasure.\e

\h(《Aika》)Fina, what do you think? 
Do you think this map is worth anything?\e

\h(《Fina》)Hmm…
He didn't appear to be the kind of person that 
would lie.\e

\h(《Aika》)Yeah, that story did seem a little far fetched, 
but it might be worth checking out.\e

\h(《Aika》)Hey…
Do you want to go searching for the treasure?\e

\h(《Fina》)Sure, I would like that very much.
It sounds interesting.\e

\h(《Aika》)Sounds like a plan. 
Let's pay the inkeeper and get going!\e

\h(《Gilder》)Why hello there. Do you want to grab a bite to 
eat? I have a friend that can come along too.\e

\h(《Aika》)We'd love to, but we're about to go on a trip. 
Maybe some other time.\e

\h(《Gilder》)I see. Well, that's too bad.
Safe travels.\e
\h(《Aika》)Thank you. Maybe we'll run into you later.\e

\h(《Gilder》)Hey, we just got into town, and you've got your 
face buried in that map. 
Have a little fun, will ya?\e
\h(《Gilder》)Hey! Where'd you get that map?!\e
\h(《Vyse》)I found it on that deserted island I was on. \e

\h(《Gilder》)That's the map to the hidden treasure of the 
legendary Air Pirate, Daccat!\e

\h(《Gilder》)It is said that he traveled the world and has 
seen all six Moons with his own eyes.\e

\h(《Gilder》)And it is also said that all the treasures that 
he accumulated on his adventures are hidden 
somewhere on a small island.\e

\h(《Gilder》)And this is a map of that island.
Vyse… you certainly know how to pick your maps!\e

\h(《Vyse》)Hmm…
But how do we know it's real?\e

\h(《Gilder》)Look… it's Daccat's seal. 
It isn't easy to duplicate that seal.\e

\h(《Gilder》)It's no fake, Vyse.
This is a real treasure map!\e

\h(《Gilder》)We can't just sit here…
We have to leave right away!\e

\h(《Vyse》)But Gilder, didn't you say something about 
meeting women and having some fun?\e

\h(《Gilder》)Which do you think is more important? Women? Or 
Daccat's Treasure? Besides, with Daccat's 
Treasure, we'll be able to get more women.\e
\h(《Gilder》)C'mon, Vyse… let's go!\e
\h(《》)You received ”Pedro's Map.”\e
\h(《Nasr Soldier》)Halt!\e

\h(《Nasr Soldier》)This is the Royal Palace of the Nasultan! If you
do not have official business, then you are not 
welcome here.\e
\h(《Vyse》)Nasultan?\e

\h(《Gilder》)The rulers of Nasr always take on the title of 
Nasultan. And this is the Royal Palace.\e

\h(《Vyse》)I see. 
So, we should tell this ”Nasultan” guy 
about Valua's plan to attack.\e

\h(《Vyse》)Please… 
We must speak to the Nasultan right away. 
Let us through.\e

\h(《Nasr Soldier》)What?! You wish to speak to the Nasultan? Do you
think we allow commoners into the Royal Palace?\e

\h(《What will you say?》)”We have important information.”
”You'd better let us through, or else!”\e

\h(《Vyse》)I have important information regarding the 
Valuan Armada. Please let us pass.\e

\h(《Nasr Soldier》)Important information about the Valuans?
Hmm…\e

\h(《Nasr Soldier》)Valua is our greatest enemy. If you have 
information about them, then perhaps we can let
you speak to the Nasultan.\e

\h(《Nasr Soldier》)Very well, I will grant you permission to enter
the Royal Palace. Now, if you will follow me.\e

\h(《Gilder》)Heh, not too shabby, kid. Who'd have thought 
that two ruffians like us would be able to meet
the Nasultan?\e

\h(《Vyse》)Well, I just figured that if they knew we were
doing them a favor, they'd let us in.\e

\h(《Vyse》)If you don't want to get hurt, you'll let us 
through.\e
\h(《Nasr Guard》)What did you say?!\e
\h(《Gilder》)Now, now… calm down everyone.\e

\h(《Gilder》)Mister uhhh… Guard, this here is Captain Vyse, 
the only Air Pirate to have ever broken out 
of the Grand Fortress.\e

\h(《Gilder》)If you don't let him pass, I'm sure you'll learn
to regret it later. Is that something you want 
on your shoulders?\e

\h(《Nasr Soldier》)What? He's the Air Pirate that escaped the Grand
Fortress?\e

\h(《Nasr Soldier》)My… my apologies!
I didn't… I didn't know that I was speaking 
to a legend! Forgive me…\e

\h(《Nasr Guard》)Just a moment!
I… I will announce your arrival!\e
\h(《Vyse》)Gilder…\e

\h(《Gilder》)Heh… I'm good at this sort of stuff.
Leave it up to me.\e

\h(《Nasultan》)So you're the Air Pirate who escaped from the 
Grand Fortress, eh? I am the Nasultan of the 
Nasr Kingdom. What is it that you want from me?\e

\h(《Vyse》)Valua is planning an attack on Nasrad. 
They are already organizing their forces.\e

\h(《Vyse》)You should warn your people and assemble your
fleet right away!\e

\h(《Nasultan》)HAHAHAHAHA!!!
You came all this way to tell me this?\e

\h(《Nasultan》)Do not fear, our navy is powerful enough to 
crush the Valuan Armada.\e

\h(《Vyse》)But, Your Majesty… you shouldn't underestimate 
them. You need to assemble your fleet or 
many innocent lives may be lost.\e

\h(《Nasultan》)HAHAHAHA!!!
You seem very concerned about Nasr for 
an Air Pirate.\e

\h(《Nasultan》)Nasrad is shielded by mountains in the south and
sky rifts to the east. It is impossible for them
to invade.\e

\h(《Nasultan》)If they were to try and invade us, it would have
to be from the north. And that is where our 
fleet is located.\e

\h(《Nasultan》)The South Danell Strait is properly guarded and 
the maelstrom blocks off the North Danell 
Strait.\e

\h(《Nasultan》)In other words, it would be impossible for 
anyone to invade us! Hahahaha!\e
\h(《Vyse》)But…\e

\h(《Nasultan》)Do not worry… Nasr is protected by the Red
Moon. Valua cannot touch us.\e

\h(《Nasultan》)And besides, if someone as young as you can get
past the Armada perhaps they're losing their 
edge.\e

\h(《Nasultan》)Imagine that… The once mighty Valuan Armada 
fooled by a boy! 
Hahahahaha!!!\e

\h(《Gilder》)It's no use, Vyse. I don't think he'll listen to
anything we have to say. Let's stop wasting our
time and get to looking for Daccat's Island.\e

\h(《Vyse》)I don't know. He seems way too overconfident, 
but I hope for his sake that he's right. 
C'mon, let's go.\e

\h(《Aika》)I was hoping to find a bunch of gold so I could 
buy a big ship…\e

\h(《Fina》)Haha…
If we all work together, perhaps you will still 
be able to buy one, Aika.\e
\h(《Gilder》)… Huh?\e
\h(《Aika》)It's the Armada!!!\e
\h(《Vyse》)How'd they get here?\e
\h(《Vyse》)The Royal Palace!\e

\h(《Gilder》)Looks like they're trying to make an example out
of Nasr.\e

\h(《Gilder》)Vyse, if we just stand around here, we're all 
dead. Head for the docks!\e

\h(《Ship Parts Merchant》)Hey there… how goes the sailing? I have cannons
for all your destructive needs! Feel free to 
take a look!\e

\h(《Aika》)Well… um… actually… we don't even have our
own ship right now…\e

\h(《Ship Parts Merchant》)So what are you doing here… window shopping?
I don't like window shoppers…\e
\h(《Ship Parts Merchant》)No window shopping allowed!!\e

\h(《Ship Parts Merchant》)Hey there… how's the sailing going?
Perhaps you'd like to buy a huge cannon to blow
your enemies out of the sky?\e

\h(《Vyse》)Well… we don't actually have our own ship right
now, so there's really no point in us buying
anything…\e

\h(《Ship Parts Merchant》)So what are you doing here… window shopping?
I don't like window shoppers…\e
\h(《Ship Parts Merchant》)No window shopping allowed!!\e

\h(《Guildmaster》)Welcome to the Sailors' Guild. We pay very well
for information on Discoveries!\e

\h(《Aika》)We have no money and no ship… I don't think we
have time to look for Discoveries…\e

\h(《Guildmaster》)Hm… That may be a problem.
If you have no money, you can always go to the 
moneylender and borrow some.\e

\h(《Guildmaster》)There's a moneylender here in this town named
Osman. Just look for the building with a picture
of a pink cat.\c

\h(《Guildmaster》)There's a moneylender here in this town named
Osman. Just look for the building with a picture
of a pink cat.\c

\h(《Guildmaster》)Welcome to the Sailors' Guild. We pay very well
for information on Discoveries!\e

\h(《What will you do?》)”Buy and Sell Discoveries information.”
”Talk about various things.”
”Leave.”\e

\h(《Guildmaster》)Actually, there was a cute girl that just came
by here saying that she didn't have any money or
a ship, either.\e

\h(《Guildmaster》)I told her to go talk to the money lender,
Osman… I wonder if she's doing alright…\e

\h(《Guildmaster》)You have the Treasure Map of Daccat?
I wonder what it will look like this time!\e

\h(《Guildmaster》)I have over 100 versions of the Treasure Map of
Daccat! Heh… I have never actually seen the
real one yet.\c

\h(《Guildmaster》)Every major port city has an office branch of
the Sailors' Guild. Make sure you stop on by.\c

\h(《Innkeeper》)Welcome! This inn is 240 gold a night.
Would you like a room?\e

\h(《Aika》)Um… We've actually been shipwrecked and we have
no money. I'm trying to find a way to raise
money, but…\e

\h(《Innkeeper》)Bah… You girls look like good kids.
I trust you. I will start a tab, and you two can
settle it when you leave, okay?\e

\h(《What will you do?》)”Stay the night.”
”Leave.”\e

\h(《Innkeeper》)You can use the room all the way in the back on
the second floor. I hope you sleep well.\e

\h(《Innkeeper》)I see.
Well, do not push yourselves too hard.
If you tire, come back here and rest.\e

\h(《Innkeeper》)Welcome back!
I bet you're tired…\e

\h(《Innkeeper》)Welcome! This inn is 240 gold a night. 
Would you like a room?\e

\h(《What will you do?》)”Stay the night.”
”Leave.”\e

\h(《Innkeeper》)You can use the room at the top of the stairs on
the second floor. I hope you sleep well.\c

\h(《Innkeeper》)I trust you slept well.
May the Red Moon light your way.\c

\h(《Innkeeper》)Hm? It appears that you lack enough gold. I am
very sorry, but you will have to come back later
when you have saved up a little more.\c

\h(《Vyse》)Oh… damn.
I don't even have enough money to get a room.\e

\h(《Vyse》)Oh well… I guess you can get the money from my
friend who should be coming by later. His name 
is Gilder and he's wearing red clothing.\e

\h(《Innkeeper》)Oh, you are Gilder's friend? He comes here
often. Do not worry about it… I trust you. I 
will ask him for the money later.\e

\h(《Innkeeper》)Go ahead and use the room directly at the top of
the stairs. I hope you enjoy your stay here in
Nasrad.\c

\h(《Innkeeper》)I see.
Well, try not to push yourselves too hard.
If you tire, come back here and rest.\c

\h(《Innkeeper》)Welcome back!
You must be tired.\e

\h(《What will you do?》)”Stay the night.”
”Leave.”\e

\h(《Innkeeper》)You can use the room at the top of the stairs on
the second floor. I hope you sleep well.\e

\h(《Innkeeper》)Did you sleep well? I wish you safe travels!
May the Red Moon light your way.\c

\h(《Innkeeper》)I see.
Well, try not to push yourselves too hard. If 
you tire, come back here and rest.\c

\h(《Weapons Merchant》)Welcome to Nasr's weapon store!
We offer the same mighty weapons that Nasr 
soldiers use!\e

\h(《Aika》)Hm… I'd like to buy some, but I don't have any
money right now.\e

\h(《Weapons Merchant》)Well, you cannot really buy anything then.
Sorry… But please come back when your purse is
a little heavier!\e

\h(《Weapons Merchant》)Well, you cannot really buy anything then. 
Sorry… But please come back when your purse is
a little heavier!\c

\h(《Weapons Merchant》)Welcome to Nasr's weapon store!
We offer the same mighty weapons that Nasr 
soldiers use!\e

\h(《What will you do?》)”Buy and Sell Weapons.”
”Talk about various things.”
”Leave.”\e

\h(《Weapons Merchant》)Ha ha ha, you say Valua will attack? I have 
heard that Valuan forces have been unusually 
active lately.\e

\h(《Weapons Merchant》)But there is no way Valuan forces can ever break
through the Nasrean fleet. There is no way to
reach this city.\c
\h(《Weapons Merchant》)May the Red Moon be with you! Come again!\c

\h(《Weapons Merchant》)Welcome! This is the Arms Shop. We have all
sorts of weapons here. The quality is top
notch! Even the Nasr guards use my weapons!\e

\h(《What will you do?》)”Buy and Sell Weapons.”
”Talk about various things.”
”Leave.”\e

\h(《Weapons Merchant》)Oh, hey! You girls work over at the tavern,
right? I have been there several times since you
two started.\e

\h(《Weapons Merchant》)What? You quit? That is unfortunate. You guys 
were starting to build up quite a little fan
club over there.\c

\h(《Weapons Merchant》)Thank you very much!
I hope you come again!\c

\h(《Nasr Merchant》)Oh! Young lady!
You were the girl that…
It has been many moons.\e

\h(《Nasr Merchant》)It is I… You and your friend escorted me to the
Nasr border a little while back.\e

\h(《Nasr Merchant》)Speaking of which, where is your friend?
You know, the one with the eye patch.
Are you not traveling with him anymore?\e

\h(《Aika》)Oh, you mean Vyse?
Well… it's a long story, but we were separated.\e

\h(《Nasr Merchant》)Oh… I understand.
Perhaps you had a… um… difference of opinion.\e
\h(《Aika》)Well, no… actually, that's not it.\e

\h(《Nasr Merchant》)You do not have to pretend. It is said that the
closer you are to one, the more they make you
angry! Hahaha!\c

\h(《Nasr Merchant》)Well, here… take this. I want you to have it.
Consider it a token of my gratitude.\e
\h(《》)You received 1 ”Abirik Cham.”\e

\h(《Nasr Merchant》)I thought that a Moon Stone shard as beautiful
as this would be fitting for ladies such as
yourselves.\c

\h(《Nasr Merchant》)It is okay to fight, just be sure to make up
afterwards! Hahaha…\c
\h(《Nasr Merchant》)Oh, young lad! It has been quite a long time!\e

\h(《Nasr Merchant》)It is I, the merchant you helped to the border 
of Nasr!\e

\h(《Nasr Merchant》)Well, I see you still are not traveling with 
your female friends… Perhaps you still have not
made up.\e

\h(《Vyse》)Huh? Made up?
What are you talking about?\e

\h(《Nasr Merchants》)Do not worry… I know, I know.
There is no need to hide a thing. Just be sure
to make up.\c

\h(《Nasr Merchant》)It is okay to fight, just be sure to make up 
afterwards! Hahaha…\c

\h(《Nasr Merchant》)Oh, is it not the young lad with the eye patch? 
It has been a while!\e

\h(《Nasr Merchant》)It is I, the merchant that you escorted to the
Nasr border!\e

\h(《Nasr Merchant》)Hm? I could have sworn that you were traveling
with a girl with braids when you escorted me
here…\e
\h(《Vyse                                        Oh, yeah》)Well, it's a long story, but we were separated.\e

\h(《Nasr Merchant》)Oh… I understand.
Perhaps you two got into an argument.\e

\h(《Vyse》)N, no…
It's not like that, you see…\e

\h(《Nasr Merchant》)I know, I know. You do not have to hide 
a thing. It is said that the closer you are to 
one, the more they make you angry! Hahaha…\c

\h(《Nasr Merchant》)It is okay to fight, just be sure to make up
afterwards! Hahaha…\c

\h(《Item Merchant                                Hello and welcome!》)This is the Nasultan's very own item shop!
We offer all kinds of high quality goods!\e

\h(《Aika》)Hm…
I would like to buy something, but I don't have
any money right now…\e

\h(《Item Merchant》)I suppose that may be a problem.
Well, please come back when you do!\c

\h(《Item Merchant》)I cannot sell you anything if you do not have
money! Come back when you do!\c

\h(《Item Merchant》)Hello and welcome!
This is the Nasultan's very own item shop!
We offer all kinds of high quality goods!\e

\h(《What will you do?》)”Buy and Sell Items.”
”Talk about various things.”
”Leave.”\e

\h(《Item Merchant》)The Nasultan has many wives… and they all live
in the palace together.\e

\h(《Item Merchant》)The Nasultan only worries when his wives argue 
with one another. He does not concern himself 
with the activities of Valua.\e

\h(《Item Merchant》)Thank you!
And may the Red Moon guide your path!\e

\h(《Bar Owner》)Welcome, young lady.
Please, come in and relax!\e

\h(《Tavernkeep》)Nasr is the center of trade! We have drinks from
the far corners of the world! Anything you may
wish, we probably have!\c

\h(《Tavernkeep》)Welcome, young lad.
Please, come in and relax!\e

\h(《Tavernkeep》)Heh… You are unlucky. Up until yesterday, I had
two very cute girls working here… but they
quit. Very unfortunate.\c

\h(《Tavernkeep》)Oh! It is you.
Here you are… this is your pay. You earned it.\e

\h(《Tavernkeep》)You both worked very hard, so I decided to help
you out with a little extra bonus. Thank you for
everything!\e
\h(《》)You received your ”Wages.”\e

\h(《》)You also received
4 ”Sapgun Leaves” and 1 ”Abirik Cham.”\e

\h(《Aika》)Wow! Thanks! With this, we finally have the
10,000 gold that we need to buy a ship!\e

\h(《Gilder》)Well well! I didn't know you had such pretty
girls working here!\e

\h(《Tavernkeep》)Gilder, you scoundrel… Keep your hands off the 
help, okay?\e

\h(《Gilder》)They just stopped working here, right?
You don't need to get so protective…\e

\h(《Bar Owner》)Some things never change…
Gilder, you never were one to resist a pretty
face…\e

\h(《Bar Owner》)Aika… Fina… Be careful out there! You better
take care of yourselves!\e

\h(《Tavernkeep》)If you ever change your mind, you are more than
welcome to work here again!\c

\h(《Bar Owner》)If you ever change your mind, you're more than
welcome to work here whenever you want!\e

\h(《Tavernkeep》)Welcome, young lad!
Please, sit down and relax!\e

\h(《Tavernkeep》)Nasr is the center of trade! We have loquas from
the far corners of the world! Any loqua you may
wish, we probably have!\c

\h(《Tavernkeep》)Aika! Fina!
How have you ladies been? Please, relax and 
enjoy yourselves while you are here!\c

\h(《Tavernkeep》)If you ever wish it, you guys are more than
welcome to work here again.\c

\h(《Depressed Man》)I heard the Empress of Valua was once a
beautiful woman…\e

\h(《Depressed Man》)But that Empress is nothing but a power hungry
old hag now. Even the prince ran away from her!\c

\h(《Depressed Man》)Huh? Valua is launching an attack? Our border
guards will take care of them… We don't have
anything to worry about…\e

\h(《Depressed Man》)But I heard that one of the admirals of the
Valuan Armada is a beauty.\c

\h(《Sailor》)The loqua and food at this joint are pretty
good, but the problem is they lack pretty
girls.\e

\h(《Sailor 》)Gazing into the eyes of that ruddy-faced
tavernkeep doesn't do much for my tired bones.\c

\h(《Sailor》)Wait a minute! What happened to those two girls 
who were here before? Yoo-hoo… Where are you, 
pretty girls?\e

\h(《Sailor 》)A couple of real cute chicks work here usually,
but I don't see them around today.\e

\h(《Sailor 》)Hey there, pretty girls! Where've you been off
to?!\e

\h(《Sailor 》)The only reason I come to this joint is to see 
you two, so you gotta be here when I come!\c

\h(《Sailor 》)The only reason I come to this joint is to see 
you two, so you gotta be here when I come!\c

\h(《Osman 》)Salutations! I am the owner of this business. 
People call me Osman.\e

\h(《Osman 》)I am what you call a financier, which is to say,
a moneylender. If you are in need of gold, I can
help you.\e

\h(《Aika 》)Will you really? Our ship was destroyed in a
shipwreck, so we need to buy a new one.\e

\h(《Aika 》)Could you lend us enough money to buy a new
ship? We promise we'll pay it back.\e

\h(《Osman 》)A shipwreck! My goodness! That must have been
terrifying! But you will have to excuse my 
asking… What will you offer as collateral?\e

\h(《Aika 》)Co, collateral? But we only barely escaped with 
the clothes on our back. We've got nothing to 
our names.\e

\h(《Osman 》)Shop manager! Please show these customers to the
door!\e

\h(《Aika 》)What's this about, all of a sudden? I said we'd
pay you back. We may not have any collateral,
but you can trust us.\e

\h(《Osman 》)I am not running a charity! I will do business 
with anyone if it will make me even a single 
piece of gold…\e

\h(《Osman 》)but I'll turn even the Nasultan away if it
looks like I could take a loss. \e

\h(《Osman 》)After all, money is my very life! O precious, 
precious money! Be on your way! Be on your way!\c

\h(《Osman 》)You won't find me lending money to just any
young lass without collateral. Be on your way,
I say. Be on your way! \e

\h(《Osman 》)Salutations! I am the owner of this business. 
People call me Osman.\e

\h(《Osman 》)I am what you call a financier, which is to say,
a moneylender. If you are in need of gold, I can
help you.\e

\h(《Vyse 》)Really? You say you'll lend money?
I could sure use a new pirate ship.\e

\h(《Osman 》)P, p, pirate? Shop manager! Please show this lad
to the door!\e

\h(《Osman 》)You will never find me lending money to any fool
who calls himself an Air Pirate! Not one piece
of gold will he receive!\e

\h(《Osman 》)After all, money is my very life! O precious, 
precious money! Be on your way! Be on your 
way!\c

\h(《Osman 》)You will never find me lending money to any fool
who calls himself an Air Pirate! Not one piece
of gold will he receive!\c

\h(《Osman》)Welcome!
I am the owner of this shop, Osman.\e

\h(《Osman》)I am the moneylender here in Nasrad. So, if you
are in dire need of assistance, you have come to
the right place… if I deem you worthy, that is.\e

\h(《Aika》)Moneylender? Well… actually, we bought a small
ship to go looking for Vyse and Cap'n Drachma,
but I'm still a little worried.\e

\h(《Aika》)I wish we had enough money to buy a real Air
Pirate ship. One with cannons and stuff. But, I
suppose we'd need A LOT more money for that…\c

\h(《Osman》)A, Air Pirates?!
Remove yourselves from my shop!
I do not deal with thieves!!!\e

\h(《Osman》)I would never lend money to a thief! I would
never get any of my precious money back! You
would probably just run off with it!!\e

\h(《Osman》)My beautiful money is too precious to just give
away to the likes of you!!
Now go away!!!\c

\h(《Osman》)I would never lend money to a thief! I would
never get any of my precious money back! You
would probably just run off with it!!\c
\h(《Osman's Clerk 》)Hello, hello! Welcome to Osman Financial.\e
\h(《Osman's Clerk 》)The owner, Osman, is in the back room.\c
\h(《Osman's Clerk 》)The owner, Osman, is in the back room.\c

\h(《Nasr Soldier 》)To the west are two straits that connect to 
Ocean.\e

\h(《Nasr Soldier 》)If Valua were to attack, it would no doubt come 
by way of one of those straits… Most likely 
the South Dannel Strait.\e

\h(《Nasr Soldier 》)But the strait is constantly guarded by Nasr's 
best naval fleet. It is absolutely impenetrable.\e

\h(《Nasr Soldier 》)What about the North Dannel Strait, you ask?
A turbulent sky rift makes that place a death
trap for ships.\e

\h(《Nasr Soldier 》)The ship has not been built that could make it 
safely through the North Dannel, so there is no 
need to guard it at all.\c

\h(《Nasr Soldier 》)The defenses of the city of Nasrad's are 
flawless. We have absolutely nothing to fear 
from Valua's scrap heap of a naval fleet!\c

\h(《Nasr Palace Guard 》)This is the Nasultan's palace. No unauthorized 
person is permitted to enter!\c

\h(《Nasr Palace Guard 》)This is the Nasultan's palace. No unauthorized 
person is permitted to enter!\c

\h(《Nasr Palace Guard 》)You can count on the palace guard to defend the 
capital!\c

\h(《Nasr Palace Guard 》)This is the Nasultan's palace. No tourists 
allowed!\c

\h(《Nasr Palace Guard 》)This is the Nasultan's palace. No tourists 
allowed!\c

\h(《Nasr Palace Guard 》)It is unthinkable that our capital could ever be
second to Valua!\c

\h(《Nasr Soldier 》)Behold, our beautiful capital! No two cities 
could be more different than our fair city and 
Valua's slag heap of a town!\e

\h(《Nasr Soldier 》)So long as our Nasr forces exist, we will never 
let the likes of Valua lay a single finger upon 
our fair city!\c

\h(《Lia  》)We're lovey-dovey sweethearts. Every day we meet
at the fountain and go to the bazaar together.\e

\h(《Kentran 》)At the bazaar in Nasrad you find exotic goods 
that have been brought here from all over the 
world.\e

\h(《Lia  》)So I see one item after another that I just 
cannot live without! And he is so sweet, he buys
me anything I wish!\e

\h(《Kentran 》)For you I would spend every last gold piece I 
had without the least regret. I love you, 
honey!\c

\h(《Man》)I hear there has been much unusual activity over
Valua way lately. I wonder if we are going to
have another war?\e

\h(《Man》)We have the Nasr Army to protect us, though, so
I do not think they will ever actually reach
this city.\c

\h(《Woman》)Hello! A long time ago, this town was a huge
oasis known as the City in the Sand.\e

\h(《Woman》)Nasrad was founded by a wealthy merchant. He 
used the oasis as his base, and built a palace 
with a wall around it.\e

\h(《Woman》)That merchant became the first Nasultan, which 
is the king of Nasr.\c

\h(《Dara 》)Somewhere… high above the skies of Nasr…
A beautiful rainbow stretches through the
clouds…\c

\h(《Sailor 》)Yikes! The ship's getting ready to leave!
Let me see, I already bought fuel.
Oh, I know! A change of underwear!\e

\h(《Sailor 》)Now, where would they sell underwear? At the
weapons shop? Ai-yi-yi, I better get a move on!\e

\h(《Sailor 》)Yikes! The ship's getting ready to leave!
Let me see, I already bought underwear.
Oh, I know! Some pickled squid for a gift!\e

\h(《Sailor》)Now, where would they sell pickled squid?
At the bazaar? At the item merchant?
Ai-yi-yi, I better get a move on!\e

\h(《Gilder 》)Hey there, Vyse. I am going to have a few more
drinks, so go on back to the inn by yourself.\c

\h(《Gilder 》)This must be my lucky day! I come ashore and the
first people I meet are you fair maidens!\e

\h(《Gilder 》)Let me introduce myself. I'm called Gilder. 
Perhaps you'll do me the favor of remembering my
name, fair maidens!\c

\h(《Mystery Merchant 》)Hy-ho-o-o! I am the Mystery Merchant! I travel 
all around the world, selling my wares!\e

\h(《Mystery Merchant 》)All that I offer is rare and wondrous. Come,
come, have a look.\e

\h(《What will you do? 》)”Buy and Sell Items.”
”Talk about various things.”
”Leave.”\e

\h(《Mystery Merchant 》)Somewhere in this world, there exists an island
upon which grows a very expensive spice called
”Pepper.”\c

\h(《Mystery merchant 》)Thank you very much.
I be happy we meet again someday.\e

\h(《ヴァイス》)へえ〜、立派な噴水だなあ。
ナスル大陸でこんなにぜいたくに
水を使うなんて驚きだな。\c

\h(《ヴァイス》)冷たくてきれいな水だ。
つい、入りたくなっちゃうな。
さすがに恥ずかしいか……\c

\h(《ヴァイス》)タルの中身はなんだろな？
お、自家製のピクルスか。
つまみ食いしていこう。\c
\h(《ヴァイス》)「本日のランチメニュー」……\e

\h(《ヴァイス》)「砂漠の民のドキドキパスタ」
「熱い風が届ける恋のスープ」
……恥ずかしくて注文できない。\c

\h(《ヴァイス》)この先は王宮か。
まわりをすべて水で覆われてる。
とても砂漠の大陸とは思えんな。\c

\h(　)「ぜいたくで豊かなくらしを
　あなたのもとに。
　オスマン金融はこちら」\c

\h(《ヴァイス》)酒に果物を漬けたものかな。
蜜が出てねっとりとして
すっげえうまそうだ！\c

\h(《ヴァイス》)ソラトビウオのオイル漬け。
アカマンボウのくんせい……
高級な食材ばっかりだ。\c

\h(《ヴァイス》)バルアワインと書いてある。
敵国のバルアの品も入ってるとは
さすがは大交易地だな。\c

\h(《ヴァイス》)うむ、しっかり編まれた
なかなか立派なザルだな。
いい仕事をしている。\c

\h(《ヴァイス》)おおっ、王宮の模型か。
へー、こりゃ良くできてるなあ。
欲しくなっちゃうよ。\c

\h(《ヴァイス》)「ナスルダンス講習会
　旅の記念に砂漠の踊りを」
ベレーザもこれで覚えたのかな？\c

\h(《ヴァイス》)「この上、展望台
　観光の記念に手形を押そう！」
ナスラードを一望できるかな？\c

\h(《ヴァイス》)へえ、きれいなもんだな。
噴水に花を浮かべてある。\c
\h(　)……フンフンフン≧\e

\h(《ヴァイス》)おっとと……
女の人が泊まってるみたいだな。
勝手に入るのはやめとこう。\e

\h(《ヴァイス》)けど、今の声……
どっかで聞いたことが
あるような気が……\c

\h(《ヴァイス》)おっ、羅針盤だ！
なかなかの年代ものだな。
かっこいいなあ。\c

\h(《ヴァイス》)賞金首の似顔絵だ。
首に賞金をかけられるのは
空賊のステイタスだよな。\c

\h(《ヴァイス》)「航海士募集」……
「宝の地図、売ります」……
いろいろなメモが貼ってある。\c

\h(《ヴァイス》)へえ、王宮の夜景か。
きれいなもんだな。\c

\h(《ヴァイス》)「熱い男に熱い刺激！
　砂漠の男のチリビール」
熱い広告だなあ。\c

\h(　)おいしいティータイムの友
マスター手作りの
ふんわりマドレーヌ\c

\h(《ヴァイス》)これはかの有名なナスル織りか。
すごい高級品って言うよな。
汚したりしたら弁償できないぞ。\c

\h(《ヴァイス》)いろいろな香辛料があるなあ。
そういやオフクロもいろんな
香辛料を使い分けてたっけ……\c

\h(《ヴァイス》)香辛料やら乾物やら
こういうのを調合して
薬をつくったりすんのかな？\c

\h(《ヴァイス》)うわっ！
……なんだ人形か。
ナスルの防砂服を着せてある。\c

\h(《ヴァイス》)武器や弾薬が
無造作に積んである。\c

\h(《ヴァイス》)お、ナスルの長剣だ。
刀身が長く、むきだしなのは
砂漠の武器独特だな。\c

\h(《ヴァイス》)おおー、豪華な細工の宝箱だな。
中身だけじゃなくって外も
いただきたくなっちゃうぜ。\c

\h(《ヴァイス》)うーむ、高価そうなツボだ。
こういうツボで
漬物を漬けたらうまいだろうか？\c

\h(《ヴァイス》)すごい強固な金庫だ……
盗賊の血が騒ぐけど
民間人の金庫は荒せないなあ。\c

\h(《ヴァイス》)コンジキクジャクをそのまま
押し絵にしてある。
さぞ高いんだろうな。\c

\h(《ヴァイス》)看板といい、クッションといい
よっぽど猫好きなのかな？
頭の上にも乗ってるしなあ。\c

\h(《アイカ》)うわあ、きれいな噴水……
砂漠の真ん中にこんな噴水が
あるなんてビックリしちゃう。\c

\h(《アイカ》)冷たくてきれいな水！
ブーツ脱いで、水遊びしたいな。
さすがに恥ずかしいか。\c

\h(《アイカ》)あ、ピクルスだ。
誰も見てないかな……
うん、おいしい！\c
\h(《アイカ》)「本日のランチメニュー」……\e

\h(《アイカ》)「月夜の砂漠のときめきピザ」
「クルルに乗った王子のサラダ」
あはは、かわいい名前！\c

\h(《アイカ》)おおー、これがナスル王宮か。
水の上に浮かぶ宮殿かあ……
なんか、おとぎ話みたい。\c

\h(　)「ぜいたくで豊かなくらしを
　あなたのもとに。
　オスマン金融はこちら」\c

\h(《アイカ》)あ、おいしそう！
お酒に果物が漬けてあって
蜜でとろとろになってる！\c

\h(《アイカ》)ソラトビウオのオイル漬け。
アカマンボウのくんせい……
うーん、食べたいなあ。\c

\h(《アイカ》)バルアワインだって。
バルアのお酒はナスルでは
入りにくいから高級品なのよね。\c

\h(《アイカ》)あ！　このザル、かわいい。
丈夫そうだし、１個欲しいな。\c

\h(《アイカ》)ナスル王宮の模型だ！
うひゃー、良くできてるなあ。
すっごいかわいいよ〜！\c

\h(《アイカ》)「ナスルダンス講習会
　旅の記念に砂漠の踊りを」
……そんな場合じゃないっての。\c

\h(《アイカ》)「この上、展望台
　観光の記念に手形を押そう！」
ナスラードを一望できるのかな？\c

\h(《アイカ》)うっわー、きれーい！
噴水に花を浮かべてある。\e

\h(《ファイナ》)アイカさん、人のお部屋に
勝手に入るのは
よくないと思いますよ。\e

\h(《アイカ》)アハ、ごめんごめん。
そーだよね、勝手に入ってっちゃ
迷惑だよね。やめとこ！\c

\h(《アイカ》)この羅針盤、けっこう年代物ね。
ヴァイス、こういうの見るの
好きなんだよなあ……\c

\h(《アイカ》)賞金首の似顔絵だ。
ヴァイスはいないみたいね。\c

\h(《アイカ》)「航海士募集」……
「宝の地図、売ります」……
いろいろなメモが貼ってあるよ。\c

\h(《アイカ》)へえ、王宮の夜景かあ。
なかなかロマンチックじゃん。\c

\h(《アイカ》)「熱い男に熱い刺激！
　砂漠の男のチリビール」
なんか暑苦しい広告ね……\c

\h(《アイカ》)「おいしいティータイムの友
　マスター手作りの
　ふんわりマドレーヌ」\c

\h(《アイカ》)あ、これがナスル織りかあ。
すごく高級品なんだよね。
とても手が出ないなあ。\c

\h(《アイカ》)いろんな香辛料があるなあ。
これだけの香辛料を使い分けたら
さぞかし料理の腕が上がるわね。\c

\h(《アイカ》)乾物とか、香辛料とか……
こういうのを調合して
薬をつくるのかな？\c

\h(《アイカ》)うひゃっ！
……なーんだ人形か。
ナスルの防砂服を着せてある。\c

\h(《アイカ》)武器に弾薬……
ずいぶん無造作に
積んであるのね。\c

\h(《アイカ》)わー、すごい剣！
ヴァイスがこういうの見たら
喜ぶだろうなー。\c

\h(《アイカ》)わあ、豪華な細工の宝箱！
中身もさぞかし……
むむむ、開かないか〜。\c

\h(《アイカ》)ひゃー、高価そうなツボ。
割ったら弁償できないし
触らないどこっと。\c

\h(《アイカ》)ずいぶん立派な金庫ね〜！
カギが何重にもかけてあるし……
こーゆーのほど狙われるんだよ。\c

\h(《アイカ》)お、コンジキクジャクだ。
商売繁盛のお守りなんだよね。\c

\h(《アイカ》)うっわあ、かわいいクッション！
おばさんの頭の上の猫が
モデルなのかー。かーわいい≦\c

\h(《ヴァイス》)そうだ……
バルアは、このナスルを
攻めようとしてるんだっけ。\e

\h(《ヴァイス》)宝島に行く前に、この国の国王に
そのことを伝えておいたほうが
いいかもしれないな。\c

\h(《ヴァイス》)なんだ、この絵は？
ただ適当に筆で
描きなぐっただけなんじゃ？\c

\h(《アイカ》)筆で描きなぐっただけのように
見えるけど、ずっと見てると
何かに見えてくるからフシギー。\c

\h(《ヴァイス》)ダメだ、開かないな。
カギがかかってるようだ。\c

\h(《アイカ》)ちぇっ、開かないよ。
カギがかかってんのかな？\c
